title: 6-hour power cuts approved from 5th – 8th April
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Public Utilities Commission of Sri Lanka has approved for power cuts that would last for six hours and thirty minutes from the 5th to the 8th of April 2022.
Health workers protest against medicine shortage & support nationwide protests
(VIDEO) Tear Gas & Water Cannons fired at protest near Carlton House
TISL calls for President & administration to bow to the will of the people
